body: that blonde guy is obviously going to be doing the Ntr. U.U the first couple of chapters was good then it got shitty, mc is probably going to jerk off to his Girlfriend being stolen.
It's a good thing the ntr tag is removed but why did the retards at sadpanda removed cheating tag as well when it's obviously cheating .
Yo this really needs an English translation. I sort of know what’s going on, especially from the ending, but the drama seems juicy so I would like to see it in English.

@Kaoz989 Learn the definition of ntr you retarded faggot before you spew bullshit from that asshole you use for mouth . Ntr means having a loved one stolen from someone whereas there is no such thing here. The girl who had sex with the mc was a virgin as it was shown not  some experienced girl who is trying to steal other people's boyfriends furthermore it wasn't her who initiated sex  which means there is no ntr here mc only cheated with her  do you understand the difference now you halfwit moron? Of course this doesnt mean the story wont be ntr in the future which has some implications involving that other playboy looking guy talking to the girlfriend of the mc but so far it didnt go any further than that so no ntr here you smartass dipshit who doesnt know what ntr is.
@metroid is it over the top like most ntr out there? Probably not. But the premise of a ntr is definitely there. Girlfriend (protagonist) is losing her loved one to someone else.

The glasses girl is the Mc. Not always the man is the Mc. The boyfriend is more interested in the other chick now. Also the lifeguard dude is interested in the glasses chick. Will more than likely bang.
i don't understand, so the glasses girl is mc's lover now? or what? someone tell me about the story please
This is only cheating not ntr at least so far.
Can't blame him. She's too hot. Plus he popped her.

The premise of ntr is for the protagonist (glasses girl) to lose/ get stolen his/her love interest by someone else. Some stories are more despicable than other. In this case, the boyfriend is clearly more interested in the super hot chick now. Than the girlfriend.
which one is the ntr? i don't get it
